Name: Rotten Pool
Description: Give venomed 3 to enemies in a cross area.

Name: Revitalize
Description: Draw a card and Heal 30 HP to friendly Character.

Name: Shadeshift
Description: Give Stealth and +20 Attack to two Allies.

Name: Illithid Act
Description: When the next enemy Ally is played, gain control of it for 2 turns.

Name: Magic Mirror
Description: When the next enemy spell is cast, counter and redirect it to new target(s).
